name: @commercetools/sdk-client
description: SDK Client for usage of commercetools platform API
author: Nicola Molinari <nicola.molinari@commercetools.com> (https://github.com/emmenko)

scripts.dist: npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build:umd: cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config ../../webpack.config.js --output-library CommercetoolsSdkClient --output-library-target umd src/index.js dist/commercetools-sdk-client.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config ../../webpack.config.js --output-library CommercetoolsSdkClient --output-library-target umd src/index.js dist/commercetools-sdk-client.min.js
